attributes.action: Demand that Nigel Farage is invloved in the EU exit negotiations
attributes.additional_details: From The Purple Revolution Website...UKIP and Nigel Farage are now being ' frozen' out of any Brexit EU negotiations. Remember its UKIP that gave us this referendum and we are 4,000,000 citizens .Ive written to Boris , please feel free to share your sentiments regarding this too ... boris.johnson.mp@parliament.uk
attributes.background: Withour Nigel Fragae there would have been no referendum. As such it is imperative that Nigel is part of the exit negotiations between the EU and Great Britain. Currently it would apprear that Nigel is  being excluded from these talks.
